error.signature: TS6305: Output file has not been built from source file. Referenced project may need to be built.

verdict.summary: Referenced project has not been built or is stale. Run tsc --build to compile project references in correct order.

dead_ends.action: Remove project references and use regular imports
dead_ends.why_fails: Loses incremental build benefits and may create circular dependency issues in monorepos

workarounds.action: Build all project references with tsc --build
workarounds.how:
# Build all referenced projects:
tsc --build
# Or force rebuild:
tsc --build --force
# Clean and rebuild:
tsc --build --clean && tsc --build

workarounds.action: Ensure composite and declaration are enabled in referenced projects

leads_to.condition: When building references reveals declaration emit issues

preceded_by.condition: When path mapping resolves into an unbuilt referenced project

frequently_confused_with.distinction: TS2307 means module is missing entirely; TS6305 means the module exists but its build output is stale or missing
